[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@kumodao/lib-ethers](./lib-ethers.md) &gt; [EthersKumoConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.etherskumoconnectionoptionalparams.md) &gt; [useStore](./lib-ethers.etherskumoconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md)

## EthersKumoConnectionOptionalParams.useStore property

Create a [KumoStore](./lib-base.kumostore.md) and expose it as the `store` property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly useStore?: EthersKumoStoreOption;
```

## Remarks

When set to one of the available [options](./lib-ethers.etherskumostoreoption.md)<!-- -->, [ReadableEthersKumo.connect()](./lib-ethers.readableetherskumo.connect_1.md) will return a [ReadableEthersKumoWithStore](./lib-ethers.readableetherskumowithstore.md)<!-- -->, while [EthersKumo.connect()](./lib-ethers.etherskumo.connect_1.md) will return an [EthersKumoWithStore](./lib-ethers.etherskumowithstore.md)<!-- -->.

Note that the store won't start monitoring the blockchain until its [start()](./lib-base.kumostore.start.md) function is called.
